__e: We have two meadow people and three of ours.
What a line of bullshit you fed us about the peasants and the revolution... - and I bought it.
He didn't start off thinking about the hicks... and the things he'd do for them.
And rednecks aren't fond of the gay population.
Most peasants have nothing to their name.
We must wage war for the peasants, not against them.
Some are no better than peasants from the Middle Ages.
Then, in that time, 'people like you will make a lot of money, kill a lot of peasant trash,' - enjoy their wives and daughters...
It seems like the workers from the farm nearby have found out that... That man is in here!
